CaseEpisode.name: CaseEpisode
CaseEpisode.description: Represents the episode linked to a case or a case proceeding result, where a business or person or license is the subject.

AddressId.description: The address where the subject is being removed from or placed at.

CaseId.description: Specifies the case associated with the case episode.

Description.description: The description of the case episode.

EndDateTime.description: End date of the case episode.

EpisodeAccountId.description: Specifies business or person account who are involved in the removal or placement of the subject.

EpisodeReasonId.description: The situation that led to the case episode.

EpisodeSubType.description: Specifies the subtypes of the case episode.

EpisodeType.description: Specifies the types of case episode.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the case episode record.

RelatedEpisodeId.description: Specifies the relationship between all related case episodes.

StartDateTime.description: Start date of the case episode.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the case episode.

StatusChangeReason.description: Specifies the reason for changing the status of the case episode.

SubjectId.description: Specifies the subject involved in the case episode.
